sections.heading: Overview
content: James E. Gerace, MD, is an  internist and pulmonology specialist in Arizona.

Gerace graduated from Loyola University Stritch School of Medicine and completed his residency in internal medicine at Brooke Army Medical Center in San Antonio.  He completed his fellowship in pulmonary disease at Fitzsimmons Army Medical Center in Denver.

Gerace is a member of the American Medical Association, the American Thoracic Society, and the Arizona Medical Society.  He is a fellow of the American College of Chest Physicians and the American Board of Quality Assurance and Utilization Review.
Gerace is board certified by the American Board of Internal Medicine with additional certification by the Subspecialty Board of Pulmonary Disease.
Gerace serves as a physician reviewer for Physicians' Review Network Inc., an independent medical review organization.
